Html:
Hello,

I downloaded Naudio a few days ago and I already fingered out how some things work. (I made already a mediaplayer/interface with a playlist method etc :) )
But like the title says, I have some questions about the LCD panel. (I found nothing on google or here)
  • What is it
  • How to use it
Thanks,

hi,
the LCD panel is a very old part of NAudio that was never finished, and has been removed in the latest version,.
